name: The_Mistake
description:
Everything was a mistake. Video games are a mistake, and pressing buttons when you don't know what they do is an idiotic move on your part, but it's too tempting...

***Most Honorable Mention Edition- Release***

Performance and bug fixes, lighting and trigger fixes.

Some dialogue triggers may act strange.

A quit command (Escape Key) has been added for all you quitters who wish to remain in boring reality.

+++2nd Mistake- Sequel in Development+++

After making the mistake of pressing buttons in a maze built in the depths of purgatory or another world, players will suffer the consequences of their simple actions. There was no choice from the beginning and we all knew that. Another world has been birthed, stuffed with even more mystifying creatures and strange puzzles.

Watch the overly-revealing trailer here

How to Play:

Left Mouse Click - Punch.Interact

Spacebar - Jump

Escape - Leave our beautiful world

Listen to NPC's for hints, and pay close attention for clues on the puzzles. Or take the easy way out by pressing that escape key and say bye bye.

Voices/Art/Unreal Development by your favorite trio:

Bryce Maciel

Rachel Cronk

Zakar Keosayan
